title: Can I play with Rioters to celebrate my 1000th win?
body: So I'm actually slightly over on my games because in the lobby it has one number of normal wins and my profile normal tab has a different number, but I've reached 1000 and I would love to get a chance to play with some Rioters. Especially Phreak the pun master if he has time. Also any other Rioters who want to play as well. I'm only Gold though you have been warned.
